page.title: 19LIVING IN THE CLUNTON AREA
page.content: Most people who live in the Clunton area are either involved in agriculture or choose to live here despite it's disadvantages. These are mainly linked to work. Lack of commerce and industry mean that people who work must travel so petrol bills are high. Many young are forced to leave the area to train or work. This means that there are few families with small children. It can sometimes be difficult in the winter for those not on the main road as side roads remain uncleared of snow. Junior children miss quite a lot of school because the outside toilets are frozen. On the whole however we are content with our lot. We live in beautiful surroundings and it's disadvantages are outweighted by the joy of living in a close community.
